name: Honey Hunt
overview: Honey Hunt is a simple children's game. The player moves the bee from the hive onto open flowers in order to gather nectar. Then, the player returns the nectar to the hive to make honey. The bee, however, has various enemies trying to destroy the bee causing the player to lose a life. The enemies include spiders with sticky spider webs, dragonflies, and bee assassins. The hive is the safety zone for the player. To escape from enemies, the player can move off the edge of the screen and then reappear on the opposite edge while enemies cannot accomplish this maneuver. The player also has to be wary of the honey-hungry bear who attempts to steal honey from the hive. In moving the bee.
